title: Minimap does not display accurately
body:
While playing in a ranked a looong time ago, I noticed how the minimap's rectangle that shows where your screen is doesn't accurately depict what you actually see. For example, you can place the rectangle so that a champion is inside it clearly but wont show up on your actual screen. 
The cause of this is that the rectangle is a depiction of a top-down view where in league of legends you are actually viewing the map from an angle.

I'm not sure how to attach pictures so I just linked it from the last time I posted
Notice how in the pictures Katarina, even though on the minimap she is supposed to appear on your own screen, is clearly not in view or covered up by a piece of the HUD

In order to fix this the rectangle needs to be changed to more of a trapezoid that widens out the farther up the screen you are and narrows towards the bottom, as you always view from that "blue side" angle
